name: Legends of Baseball - MLB Yankees Version
name_original: Legends of Baseball - MLB Yankees Version
description:
Legends of Baseball - MLB Yankees Version is a FREE retro action platformer adventure game!

Entertaining gameplay, hours of fun guaranteed!

Find the key to unlock next level, avoid enemies and obstacles and find your way out!

Get through all 24 rooms to complete the game - but be careful - it is not as easy as it looks!

Help the baseball legend to jump up and down with just an easy touch.

Get bonus points by collecting coins. Get ranked in leaderboard.

Legends of Baseball - MLB Yankees Version is waiting for you - download now and share with friends!

But be careful - there might be some teams in MLB beating New York Yankees!
